text:
any hospitals your midwife 
can arrange for you to talk 
to an anaesthetist about 
analgesia or anaesthesia if 
you have medical or obstetric 
problems. Before or during 
labour you will be able to 
speak to your anaesthetist.
A paediatrician is a doctor 
specialising in the care 
of babies and children. A 
paediatrician may check 
your baby after the birth to 
make sure all is well and will 
be present when your baby 
is born if you have had a 
difficult	labour.	If	your	baby	
has any problems,
